title: Bedside Bottle And Drinking Glass, "Josephine", 2006
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Simple, tall bottle (-144a) of thin-bodied, pink-tinted clear glass, the tapering cylindrical neck flaring into bubous belly above short stem with circular foot; matching ovoid drinking glass  (-144b) with short stem and circular foot can be inverted to sit in mouth of bottle as fitted stopper.

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedside Bottle And Drinking Glass, "Josephine", 2006.
2006. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-144-a,b.
